She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina works hard to support her family. Regina is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional fishing materials.

Regina has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Regina would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fsihing materials

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en: Imelda is 47 years old and married and has three children. She and her spouse are farmers. They plant and harvest rice in a hectare rice field. Imelda wants to keep producing a good harvest but has insufficient funds for farm inputs to sustain her crops. She is now asking for additional capital of 25,000 PHP to buy fertilizers, pesticides and insecticides used in farming. These will help her maintain good crop production, leading to a profitable harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and insecticides used in farming

loans.name: Segundo Felix

texts.es:
Segundo Felix tiene 51 años de edad, vive en el Caserio Huancas, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, está ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El brinda servicios como transportista, realizando esta actividad desde hace 5 años, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 800 nuevos soles para invertir en arreglos de su unidad de transporte y de esta manera generar ingresos adicionales para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Segundo Felix is 51 years old and lives in the village of Huancas, a community with a warm climate. The people engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breedking. This area is located in Cutervo Province, which is part of the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru.

Segundo Felix provides transportation services and has been in this business for five years. He is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 800 PEN so that he can invest in repairs to his vehicle. This will enable him to generate additional income so that he can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle repairs.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.en:
Gregorio is 50 years old, a farmer living at Alcala with his family. He relies on income from planting and harvesting rice which he sells. He had been in the farming business since he got married, and still continues his business up to now. He has gained a lot of farming practice, but he still wanted to improve his production. 

He is now asking for a loan of P30,000 to buy fertilizer and herbicides to use in farming. This will help improve crop growth and nutrition. 

Someday, with a good harvest, he will be able to save funds for the family's emergency purposes.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides to use in farming

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Edwin is a married man. He has three children. He describes himself to be optimistic. 

He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his bicycle. He has been involved in this business for 10 years. His business is located in a vibrant location, and his primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge to be a lack of capital. 

He will use the Kes 15,000 loan to buy two bicycles for his transport business. His business goal is to own two motorcycles within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will educate his children. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy two bicycles for his transport business

loans.name: Everlyne

texts.en:
Everlyne is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself as being determined. 

Everlyne operates a Mpesa business where she offers mobile phone-based money transfer services. She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located in a vibrant location and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. 

She will use the KES 50,000 loan to add Mpesa float money for customers to transact. Her business goal is to own two Mpesa businesses within five years. She hopes that, in the future, she will educate her children. 

This is Everlyne's second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Her previous loans were successfully repaid.

loans.use: to add Mpesa float money for customers to transact.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a restaurant business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like meat, spices, fish, etc. for her restaurant business.

Thelma has been in this business for 15 years. Thelma earns more income from a general store and from farming rice.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like meat, spices, fish, etc

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 26 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell.

Alma has borrowed and paid back 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from a manicure and pedicure service.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell

loans.name: Guldar

texts.ru: Гулдар 34 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Гулдар среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается полеводством, стартовав более 10 лет назад, благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Гулдар, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 1,07 ГА собственной земли, в том числе есть фруктовый сад и огород, где Гулдар выращивает различные овощи и фрукты, в том числе рис, табак, кукурузу, пшеницу. Ежемесячный доход от реализации сельскохозяйственной экологически чистой продукции оптовым покупателям составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Гулдар обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для закупки селитры и для проведения полевых работ. Гулдар намерена расширить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи.
texts.en: Guldar is 34 years old, married and raising 4 children together with her husband. Guldar has a secondary education and, to provide the primary source of income for her family, has been involved in farming for over 10 years. Thanks to Guldar's persistence, drive and hard work, today she has 1.07 hectares of owned land, inclusive of a fruit orchard and garden, where she grows various vegetables and fruits, such as rice, tobacco, corn and wheat. The monthly income from selling ecologically clean agricultural produce to wholesale buyers amounts to about 10,000 som (KGS). Guldar requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy saltpeter and hold field work. Guldar intends to expand her business, which would certainly lead to increasing the family's capital.

loans.use: to buy saltpeter and hold field work in order to grow ecologically clean vegetables

loans.name: Marlene

texts.en:
Marlene is 31 years old and married with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a business retailing gasoline in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional gallons of gasoline to sell.

Marlene has borrowed and paid 1 loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the retail of gasoline for 1 year, and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional gallons of gasoline to sell

loans.name: Ceriaca

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Ceriaca works hard to support her family.

She has a fruit vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Ceriaca is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more stocks of fruits to sell for her fruit vending business.

Ceriaca has been sustaining her business activities through her past 18 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of fruits to sell

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is 38 years old, and married with one child. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

She has a buy and sell cashew nut business in the Philippines. Mary Ann requested a PHP 9,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy cashew nuts to sell.

Mary Ann has been in this business for 1 year.  In the future, Mary Ann would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy cashew nuts to sell

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy works hard to support her family. Daisy has a buy and sell cashew nuts business in the Philippines.

Daisy requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of cashew nuts to sell.

Daisy has been in this business for one year now.

In the future, Daisy would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of cashew nuts to sell.

loans.name: Jose Saul

texts.es: José de 43 años de edad vive con sus dos hijos de 18 y 17 años de edad. Él es un trabajador que desde hace 30 años se gana la vida elaborando y distribuyendo pan francés, además la madre de sus hijos emigro al extranjero para tratar de mejorar las condiciones de vida de la familia. José desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que este se encuentra en mal estado. por lo anterior solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar: lámina galvanizada y polines para cambiar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en:
José is 43 years old and lives with his two children who are 17 and 18 years old.  He is a hard-worker who for 30 years has earned a living making and distributing baguettes.  Additionally, the mother of his two children emigrated abroad in order to try to improve the conditions of the family. 

José wishes to change the roof of his house because it is in a bad state.  For this, he asks FUSAI for a loan to buy sheet metal and poles in order to change the roof of his house.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal and poles in order to change the roof of his house.

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
Sylvia is a married woman. She has one child. She describes herself to be focused. 

She operates a retail business where she sells shoes. She has been involved in this business for three years. Her business is located in a vibrant location, and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be a lack of capital. 

Sylvia will use the Kes 80,000 loan to buy more stock of shoes. Her business goal is to own a boutique within five years. 

She hopes that in the future, she will buy a piece of land and build a house. This is her fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of shoes

loans.name: Carren

texts.en: Carren is a married woman. She has 6 children. She describes herself to be optimistic. She operates a retail business where she sells fish. She has been involved in this business for 15 years. Her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. She will use the KES 80,000 loan to buy more stock of fish. Her business goal is to own a freezer for storing fish within 5 years. She hopes that in the future she will educate her children. This is her fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Ivonne

texts.es:
Ivonne es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es soltera, tiene 23 años de edad y vive en San Martin junto a su familia. Gracias al apoyo de sus padres ella está estudiando la carrera de Contabilidad y hoy se desempeña como Asistente Contable en una prestigiosa empresa y le va muy bien debido a su excelente desempeño y a que siempre trabaja con honestidad.
Ivonne quiere comprar libros para poder ampliar sus conocimiento de contabilidad. Está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá obtener esos libros y seguir estudiando para poder convertirse más adelante en una profesional exitosa, tramitar su Título y estudiar una Colegiatura.
texts.en:
Ivonne is a young woman who has the drive to succeed. She is 23 years old, single, and lives with her family in San Martin. Thanks to the support of her parents, she is studying for a degree in Accounting. At the moment, she is working as an assistant accountant at a prestigious company and is doing well. She has demonstrated excellent performance and always works in an honest manner.

Ivonne wants to buy books so that she can expand her knowledge of accounting. She is grateful to the Kiva lenders because of the assistance they have provided. Ivonne will be able to buy those books and continue studying so that she can become a successful professional in the future. When she obtains her degree, she would like to study for a fellowship.

loans.use: to buy books for her studies.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena, a 30-year-old single mother of one, has been selling used clothes in their village for almost three years. She earns about PHP 600 daily, income usually spent on their daily expenses at home. 

Due to insufficient funds Elena would like to avail a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase more used clothes and shoes to sell. She is hoping that her business will continue to improve and become more profitable.

loans.use: To purchase used clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice, plastics and grocery items to resell

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco Antonio tiene 32 años de edad, vive en el Caserio Puente Techint que pertenece al distrito de Pucara, una comunidad de clima caluroso, es tranquila su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaen que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El brinda servicios de transporte por mototaxi, realizando esta actividad desde hace 10 años, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles porque desea invertir en la compra y venta de variedad de frutas de estación para ofrecerlo al por menor a sus clientes, y también para la compa de implementos para su mototaxi, de esta manera generará ingresos adicionales y sus ganancias aumentaran lo q le permitirá una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marco Antonio is 32 years old and lives in the community of Puente Techint, which belongs to Pucara district. It is a quiet area with hot weather, and most of its residents work farming, raising livestock, or trading. It is located in the province of Jaen, which belongs to the region of  Cajamarca, in Peru's northern mountains.

He offers transportation services on his auto rickshaw, and has been doing this for ten years. He is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1,500 nuevos soles because he wants to invest in purchasing assorted seasonal fruit, which he will sell to his customers at retail price. He will also buy parts for his auto rickshaw. This will allow him to supplement his income so that his profit increases and he can afford a better quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in his fruit business and buy materials to repair his auto rickshaw.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel tiene 28 años de edad, vive en el Caserio Playa Azul que pertenece al Distrito de Pucara, una comunidad de clima caluroso, es tranquila su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaen que pertenece a la Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de fruta, realizando esta actividad desde hace 5 años, adicionalmente se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte por tototaxi ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de frutas de estación para ofrecerlo al por menor a sus clientes y de esta manera generar ingresos adicionales para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Isabel is 28 years old and lives in the community of Playa Azul, which belongs to Pucara district. It is a quiet area with hot weather. Its residents work farming, raising livestock, and trading. It is located in the province of Jaen, located in Cajamarca, in Peru's northern mountains.

She works selling fruit, and has been doing this for five years. She also works providing transportation services on her auto rickshaw. She is requesting a loan from  Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 2,000 nuevos soles to buy assorted seasonal fruit, which she will sell to her customers at retail price. This will allow her to make more income in order to achieve a better quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in seasonal fruit for her business.

loans.name: José Dolores

texts.es:
José de 58 años de edad, es un agricultor y jornalero  de la zona norte de  El Salvador, el cual trabaja con mucha fe y esperanza; por ello sabe que la compañía de su esposa a sido parte importante para lograr lo que a hasta este momento tiene. Sin padres de 8 hermosos hijos,  los cuales son ahora un apoyo fundamental para ellos.  


José  es agricultor desde los 8 años de edad, desde que pudo tomar en sus manos un machete él esta con todo realizando esta actividad con la cual logra cosechar para así poder alimentar a toda su familia y lo ha hecho durante mucho tiempo ahora sus hijos ya unos acompañados le ayudan en lo que pueden y los últimos todavía le apoyan a un 75%  él se siente muy orgulloso de ellos. 


El préstamo se empleara para comprar semilla de maíz, abono, fertilizantes,  para la milpa de esta temporada que esta en apogeo; por ello es muy necesario el apoyo para que gente como José puedan lograr objetivos tanto a nivel personal como productivo.

 A futuro  José está pesando en  mejorar considerablemente su calidad de vida, tanto como su cosecha; por ello es muy necesario que él continué con esta lucha ya que con ello lograra una notable mejoría en su calidad de vida, por tanto él manifiesta que continuara realizando sus actividades agrícolas mientras las fuerzas no le abandonen.
texts.en:
José, 58 years old, is a farmer and a day laborer in the northern region of El Salvador, who works with much faith and hope; for this he knows that his wife's presence has been an important part of achieving what he has done to now.  They are parents of 8 lovely children, who now are an important support for them.

José has been a farmer since he was 8 years old; since he could take a machete in his hand, he has been doing this work with which he manages to harvest in order to be able to feed all of his family.  He has done it for a long time, now some of his children are partnered and help him in what they can, and the others still help him about 75%. He feels very proud of them. 

The loan will be used to purchase corn seed, manure and fertilizer for this season's cornfield that is at its peak; for this the support is very important so that people like José can  achieve their goals at a personal level as well as productive.

In the future, José is thinking of considerably improving his quality of life, such as this harvest; for this reason it is quite necessary that he continues with this fight since with it he will manage to make a noticeable improvement in his quality of life. So, he says that he will continue working in his agricultural tasks while he still has the strength.

loans.use: to purchase corn seed, manure, and fertilizer for this season's cornfield that is at its peak; for this the support is very important so that people like José can  achieve their goals at a personal level as well as productive.

loans.name: Joselin

texts.es: Joselin es una mujer de 41 años de edad que habita con su cónyuge y sus 2 hijos en el municipio de Soledad, muy cerca a la ciudad de Braranquilla. Allí se dedica dede hace 2 años a la venta de carnes frías, negocio que inició en el mes de Noviembre del año 2012, cuando impulsada por apoyar a su esposo en la gestión de bienestar de su hogar, aprovechó los viajes de su madre a un vecino país, para que esta trajera a Colombia mercancia variada como calzado, sábanas, sandalias etc, Posteriormente con la clientela organizada inició su venta de salchichas, mortadela, butifarras, chorizos caseros etc. Hoy sus ventas las realiza a crédito, trabajando desde las 8 de la mañana hasta la 1 de la tarde, mediante el sistema de crédito, y  sus clientes le pagan quincenalmente. Joselin, compra directamente a los productores de alimentos y vende a aempleados, vecinos, amigos, familiares y referídos, que ya conocen la calidad de sus productos. En la actualidad está aplicando a un creidkiva, primer finaciamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará carnes frias, postres y mercancia variada, en un mayor volumen que el acosumbrado, con todo esto Joselin hará rendir su capital para mejorar su negocio y en el futuro emprender su actividad en un local, apoyando cada vez mas los estudios de calidad para sus hijos, que se necuentran en las edades de 17 y 18 años.
texts.en: Joselin is a 41-year-old woman who lives with her spouse and their 2 children in the municipality of Soledad, very close to the city of Baranquilla.  There, she has worked for the past 2 years selling cold meat, a business that she began in the month of November in 2012 when, motivated to help her husband in supporting the well-being of their household, she took advantage of her mother's trips to a neighboring country that she would bring various merchandise to Colombia such as shoes, sheets, sandals, etc. Later, with a set customer base, she began to sell sausages, bologna, small sausages, homemade chorizo, etc. She currently makes her sales on credit, working from 8 in the morning to 1 in the afternoon, through the credit system, and her customers pay her every two weeks.  Joselin purchases directly from the food producers and sells to workers, neighbors, friends, family members, and people who have been referred to her, since they know the quality of her products. At the moment, she is applying for a Kiva loan, the first loan that she has taken from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will purchase cold meat, desserts, and a variety of merchandise, at a larger volume than she usually does.  With all of this, Joselin will use the capital to improve her business and, in the future, undertake her business in a retail space, always supporting the quality education of her children, who are now 17 and 18 years old.

loans.use: to purchase cold meats, desserts, and a variety of merchandise.

loans.name: Rosa Judith

texts.es:
Con  el ánimo de mejorar y ser más competente en el barrio la señora rosa llega a la corporación con la determinación de solicitar un crédito para la compra de insumos para realizar preparaciones como panzerotis, pasteles de pollo, empanadas, arepas con huevo entre otros, que son aperitivos muy típicos de la región de Antioquia. 

Es una madre de 56 años de edad de dos hijos ya mayores que sueña con tener una tienda de distribución de alimentos y que desde muy temprano de la madrugada se levanta a realizar sus preparaciones para tenerlas siempre frescas y que su público le compren pues es la única fuente de ingreso que tiene ya que no es pensionada.

Con el crédito mejorara su empresa y también comprara gaseosas para complementar su oferta hacia el cliente y buscas que la competencia no le haga cerrar su humilde negocio.
texts.en:
With the goal of improving and being more competitive in the neighbourhood, Rosa is requesting a loan to use to buy supplies for making panzerottis, chicken pies, empanadas, and arepas with egg, which are typical snacks in the Antioquia region. 

Rosa is a 56-year old mother of two adult children. She dreams of having a food distribution shop. She wakes up very early in the morning to start making the snacks so that they will always be fresh for her customers. This is the only source of income she has, as she is not a pensioner. 

She will use the loan to improve her business and also to buy soft drinks to complement the products she sells to her customers. She wants to make sure that competition will not force her to close her modest business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making panzerottis, chicken pies, empanadas, arepas with egg, and soft drinks to complement these products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise for her food stall.

loans.name: Cosme

texts.es:
Cosme tiene 38 años de edad, vive en el Caserio de Piquijaca que pertenece al distrito de San Felipe, una comunidad de clima caluroso, es tranquila su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, la comunidad esta ubicada en la Provincia de Jaen que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Él se dedica a la agricultura, realizando esta actividad desde hace 6 años, adicionalmente se desempeña como trabajador obrero ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para su finca de lima y de esta manera generar ingresos adicionales para una mejor calidad de vida de él y de su familia.
texts.en:
Cosme is 38 years old and lives the Piquijaca Caserio, which belongs to San Felipe district, a community with a warm climate; it is peaceful and the population works in agriculture, trade, and animal husbandry.  The community is located in Jaen province, which is part of Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Perú.

He works in agriculture, and has done this work for the past 6 years and, in addition, he works as a laborer.  He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to purchase fertilizer for his lemon farm, and in this way generate additional income for a better quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to invest in his business and purchase fertilizers for his lemon farm.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes de 64 años de edad vive con su madre de 82 años de edad. Ella es una mujer tenaz que se gana la vida con su pequeño negocio de venta de tamales de pollo, actividad que realiza desde hace 30 años, además vende diversidad de atoles lo que le permite tener un ingreso extra. Por lo anterior ella es reconocida en su cantón como una mujer trabajadora. Mercedes desea construir un patio en su vivienda por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar: cemento, arena, grava, hierro y también deberá pagar mano de obra para construir un corredor en su vivienda.
texts.en: Mercedes, 64 years old, lives with her 82-year-old mother. She is a tenacious woman who earns her living with her small business selling chicken tamales, work she has done for the past 30 years. In addition, she sells a variety of corn-based drinks (atoles), which allows her to have extra income. For this, she is known in her canton as a hard-working woman. Mercendes wants to build a patio in her house, so she asks FUSAI for a loan to purchase cement, sand, gravel, iron and to pay labor costs to construct an open hall in her house.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, iron and to pay labor costs to construct an open hall in her house.

loans.name: Larry

texts.es:
Larry es un joven emprendedor, soltero, de 27 años de edad, vive en Tarapoto junto a su familia.
Es una persona que se preocupa siempre por el bienestar de su familia y los apoya en todo lo que esté dentro de sus posibilidades. Gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres y algunos trabajos que realizó pudo estudiar la Carrera Profesional de Administración Bancaria. Actualmente trabaja En un Canal de Televisión como Productos y le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, trabajador y labora con ética.
Larry quiere comprarse un juego de dormitorio para amoblar su cuarto y de esta manera pueda descansar mejor. Él está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá cubrir esta necesidad que tiene y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Así seguirá esforzándose para más adelante poder concretar una meta que tiene: "Comprarse una casa propia y formar su familia".
texts.en:
Larry is an enterprising young man, single and 27 years old, who lives in Tarapoto with his family.

He is a person who always is concerned for the well-being of his family and supports them with everything that is within his abilities. Thanks to the efforts of his parents, and some work that he has done, he was able to study for a banking administration professional degree. At the moment, he works at a television station as a producer and it is going very well for him, since he is very responsible, hard-working and works ethically. 

Larry wants to buy himself a bedroom set to furnish his bedroom, and in this way be able to rest better. He is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because, with the support they have offered him, he will be able to meet this need that he has and, in turn, improve his quality of life. In this way, he will continue working hard so that in the future he can meet a goal that he has: to buy himself his own house and have a family.

loans.use: to purchase a bedroom set for his house.

loans.name: Jaime Alberto

texts.es:
El señor Jaime hace 8 años se dedica al negocio de fabricación de traperas y escobas una actividad que aprendió gracias a un amigo y que le vio futuro y se independizo y comenzó a ejercer esta profesión. 

Dejo de trabajar un tiempo por cuidar a su esposa, madre y padre de su esposa pues se encontraban muy delicados de salud. 

Quiere solicitar un crédito para retomar su labor pues ya su casa hace mucha falta el capital que el señor Jaime aporta, como dejo de trabajar un tiempo solicita un monto considerable para comprar materia prima e iniciar con la fabricación y distribución del producto que lo hace en una bicicleta.

Sueña con tener un carro para trabajar y adecuar un lugar en su casa para solo fabricar traperos y escobas.
texts.en:
Jaime has been manufacturing mops and brooms for eight years. He learned this trade through a friend and saw potential in this line of work, so he went out on his own and started his own business.

He stopped working for a while in order to take care of his wife and her parents, because they were in very poor health.

He is requesting this loan in order to get back to work, because the capital that Jaime contributes to his household is sorely needed. Since he was not working for a while, he is requesting a substantial amount in order to buy materials and start manufacturing and distributing his products, which he does by bicycle.

His dream is to have a car for work and to set up a space at home that he can dedicate exclusively to manufacturing his mops and brooms.

loans.use: to buy materials for manufacturing mops and brooms.

loans.name: José Eustaquio

texts.es:
José  de 55 años de edad, es un hombre muy trabajador, con ganas de salir siempre adelante junto a su esposa. Vive junto a su esposa y un nieto que lo acompaña y le apoya en las labores cotidianas.

José es constructor y albañil desde hace mucho tiempo con su tío el que le enseño el oficio,  por ello considera que desempeña muy bien; pero también cabe destacar que cuando no esta construyendo trabaja como vigilante de un autolote en su lugar natal del que obtiene también beneficios los cuales le ayudan a soportar la carga económica. 

El préstamo se empleara para comprar, cemento, arena, piedra, para construir una habitación a su casa, con la finalidad que cuando sus parientes vengan del interior del país puedan hacer uso de el.

Sus planes a futuro son seguir mejorando su calidad de vida, con ello alcanzara mas y mejores beneficios para él y su familia, por ello nos manifiesta que como plan a futuro pretende ampliar mas su vivienda, ya que con ello construirá una bodega para guardar sus herramientas.
texts.en:
Jose, 55, is a very hard-working man with a desire to get ahead along with his wife.  He lives with his wife and a grandson who accompanies him and helps him with his daily labors.
Jose has been a builder and a mason for a long time with his uncle who taught him the job.  Because of this, he thinks he makes out very well, but it is important to point out that, when he is not building, he works as a watchman for a car lot in his hometown from which he gets income which helps him bear the economic burden.
The loan will be used to buy cement, sand, and stone to construct a bedroom which, when his parents come from the interior of the country, they can make use of.
His future plans are to continue improving his quality of life by which he will reach more and better benefits for himself and his family. In this way, he shows us that, as a future plan, he hopes to increase the size of his dwelling and to construct a storeroom to keep his tools in.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and stone to construct a bedroom on his house so that, when his parents come from the interior of the country, they can use it.

loans.name: Jose Julian

texts.es:
El es José, un Hombre de carácter y buena voluntad, con deseos de progresar y salir adelante con su esposa y su hijo.

El decidió iniciar su negocio de preparación y venta de comidas rápidas y bebidas desde hace aproximadamente 5 meses en un pequeño local con muchas ganas y empuje. 

Este oficio lo aprendió trabajando en muchos restaurantes en meses pasados y esto le permitió obtener gran experiencia.

Hoy en día desea darle un pequeño impulso a su negocio y consolidarlo fuertemente, por esta razón requiere un crèdito para realizar adecuaciones locativas como trabajos de pintura, reforma, montaje de baño y poner un techo en la parte de en frente del local para que no se entre el agua cuando llueve.

Con este préstamo podrá ofrecerles a sus clientes una mejor atención y esto se verá reflejado en el aumento de sus ventas.

Con este préstamo estarás apoyando a un hombre emprendedor con todas sus fuerzas enfocadas en su familia.
texts.en:
José bears good character and good will. He wants to move forward and provide for his wife and son. About five months ago, he decided to start a business preparing and selling fast food and drinks. It is a small space, but he has lots of drive and determination. He learned this job by working in many restaurants in the past months, which has allowed him to gain lots of experience.

Today he wants to give his business a little push so that it becomes solidly established. That is why he is requesting a loan to make improvements to his business, like painting, remodeling, installing a bathroom, and building a roof over the front of the business so that water doesn't come in when it rains.

This loan will allow him to give his customers better service, which in turn will increase sales. It will be of great help to an enterprising man who is focusing all his efforts on his family.

loans.use: to paint, remodel, install a bathroom, and build a roof over the front of his business.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro es un joven estudiante de 20 años  de 4 semestre de ingeniería de sistemas nacido en el lecho de una familia humilde donde siempre desbordaba el amor y el cariño pero carecían de recursos económicos. 

Quiere comenzar con un negocio de venta de productos de uso personal de la marca Amway ya que quiere sostener sus gastos comercializando en sus ratos libres y ayudar con algo en la casa ya sea para comprar un pan, un huevo o lo que haga falta para que no pasen necesidades. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de productos Amway, soñando terminar sus estudios y convertirse en un gran comerciante con un buen rango en la escala de vendedores de la empresa. 

Es soltero y solo piensa en estudiar para progresar pro eso se solicita la ayuda de colaborar con el progreso de un estudiante que piensa primero en su familia que en el beneficio propio.
texts.en:
Alejandro is a young student who is twenty years old and in his fourth semester of Systems Engineering. He was born to a humble family where there was plenty of love and caring but lacked in financial resources.

He wants to start a business selling Amway-brand personal products, which he will sell in his spare time in order to contribute something to his household, be it to buy bread or eggs or whatever they need in order to make ends meet.

He is requesting this loan to buy Amway products. His dreams are to finish school and also to become a great salesman and hold a high position in the company's chain of salespeople.

He is single and focused only on studying in order to move forward. This loan will help a student who puts his family before his own benefit.

loans.use: to buy Amway-brand personal products.

loans.name: Erick

texts.en: Erick is a male Kiva borrower. He has 4 children. He describes himself to be focused. He operates a farm where he grows tea. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. His business is located in a rural area and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be unfavourable weather conditions. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of tea leaves for resale. His business goal is to excel within 5 years. He hopes that in the future he will be a better person. He will use the anticipated profits to pay the loan and school fees for his children.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tea leaves for resale.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Elena is 35 years old and has five children who are currently in school.

Elena has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a 20000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional soft drinks, canned goods, noodles, biscuits, coffee, sugar, and other items to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business.

Elena has been in this business for 7 years. In the future, Elena would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional soft drinks, canned goods, noodles, biscuits, coffee, sugar, and other items to sell

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena is 64 years old, married and blessed with ten children. She is married to Maximo. They have helped each other to maintain their farm for almost 15 years. Lucena is very hardworking mother and always seeks the needs of her family. Lucena is asking a loan so that she can buy fertilizer and seeds to grow for her farm business. 

Lucena hopes that she can save money for the future of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farm business

loans.name: Enriqueta

texts.en:
Enriqueta is 52 years old and married with five children. With three children currently in school, Enriqueta works very hard to provide for her family. For the past four years, Enriqueta has run a general store in the Philippines. She sells a variety of items such as coffee, sugar, juice, canned goods, beer, soy sauce and other products. 

Enriqueta is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell in her general store.  In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Taalaikul

texts.ru: Таалайкул 39 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей, образование средне-специальное, работает медсестрой в областной больнице. Успешно занимаясь животноводством и полеводством, Таалайкул добилась очень хороших результатов, у нее есть 1 корова, 10 овец и 2 лошади. Ежемесячный доход Таалайкул составляет около 12,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Таалайкул обратилась в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. На прибыль от кредита Таалайкул планирует увеличить своё хозяйство. На сегодняшний день Таалайкул с семьей проживает в квартире, а скот содержит в сараях свекра, поэтому она мечтает накопить средства на покупку собственного дома с большими сараями для скоты.
texts.en: Taalaikul is 39 years old, married and a mother of 3 children. Taalaikul has a secondary-specialized education and works as a nurse at a district hospital. Successfully involved in animal husbandry and farming, Taalaikul achieved very good results - she has 1 cow, 10 sheep and 2 horses. Her monthly income amounts to about 12,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Taalaikul requested a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy livestock. Taalaikul plans to use the profit from the loan to expand her business. Today, Taalaikul and her family live in an apartment and keep livestock at her father-in-law's barns, and this is why she dreams of savings money to buy her own house with large barns for the livestock.

loans.use: to buy livestock in order to save money and buy a house for her family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of maize.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a married man with three children with ages ranging from four to 10. For the past five years, he has run a carpentry business where he makes furniture to sell. James describes himself to be self-oriented. His business is located in a developing area and his biggest business challenge is inadequate finances. This will be his third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. James successfully repaid his previous loans.

James is requesting an 80,000 KES loan to buy more stock of carpentry materials. His business goal is to open a show room for selling his furniture within five years. James hopes that in the future he will have a business that will sustain his family.

loans.use: buy carpentry materials

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a married man. He has five children with ages ranging from five years to 15 years. He describes himself to be honest. He operates a carpentry business where he makes furniture for sell. He has been involved in this business for three years. His primary customers are regular. He describes his biggest business challenge to be changes in season and insecurity. He will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy more timber for making furniture. His business goal is to be the best within five years. He hopes that in the future he will raise the living standards of his family. This is his fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more timber for making furniture.

loans.name: Baktygul

texts.ru: Бактыгул 32 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. У Бактыгул среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав в 2002 году благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Бактыгул, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 3 коровы, 1 теленок и 5 овец. Также есть земельный надел мерою 0,80 ГА, где Бактыгул сеет фасоль и клевер. Ежемесячный доход от реализации экологически чистых овощей составляет от 12,000 сом до 18,000 сом (KGS). Бактыгул обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) для закупки семян, селитры, удобрений и ГСМ для проведения полевых работ. Бактыгул является лидером группы "Достук Жайылган", кроме нее в группе состоят еще 3 человека. Бактыгул намерена получить хороший урожай, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи и позволит увеличить поголовье дойных коров, а также доходов от реализации молока. Доходы от кредита она хочет направить на оплату за обучение детей.
texts.en: Baktygul is 32 years old, married and raising 3 children together with her husband. Baktygul has a secondary education and, to provide the primary source of income for her family, has been involved in animal husbandry and farming since 2002. Thanks to Baktygul's persistence, drive and hard work, today she has 3 cows, 1 calf and 5 sheep. She also has a 0.80 hectare land plot, where she plants beans and clover. The monthly income from selling ecologically clean vegetables amounts to 12,000-18,000 som (KGS).  Baktygul requested a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy seeds, saltpeter, fertilizers and fuel for doing field work. Baktygul is a leader of the "Dostuk Jayelgan" group that consists of another 3 people. Baktygul intends to get a good harvest, which will certainly lead to increasing the family's capital and allow to increase the headcount of dairy cows and also income from selling milk. She wants to direct the earnings from the loan to paying for her children's education.

loans.use: buy seeds, saltpeter, fertilizers and fuel for doing field work and growing ecologically clean vegetables

loans.name: Dickson

texts.en: Dickson is a married man. He describes himself to be prosperous. He operates a cyber café where he offers internet browsing and printing services. His business is located in a marketable area and his primary customers are the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds. He will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy printing papers and other cyber cafe items to enable him expand business. His business goal is to have a bigger cyber premise within five years. He hopes that in the future he will have more businesses. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy printing papers and other cyber cafe items.

loans.name: Suraya

texts.en: Suraya is 48 years old and lives in Lahore. She is married and has four children. She is a dedicated mother and is always supportive of her family. One of her children is a rickshaw driver by profession. He works hard to contribute to the family. He has been in this business for over five years now. Given the wear and tear of driving the rickshaw, it needs some maintenance to run smoothly. He is unable to arrange the funds needed for the maintenance of his rickshaw, due to lack of savings and low income. Therefore, Suraya has applied for a loan from BRAC Pakistan, a Kiva partner, to help her son with the funds required for maintenance purposes. Her son's dream is to expand his rickshaw business, for which he works day and night.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of her son's rickshaw.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy-and-sell cashew-nut business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of cashew nuts to sell.

Mary Jane has been in this business for 6 years. She earns more income from fishing. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of cashew nuts to sell

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn works hard to support her family. Merlyn is married and has a buy and sell cashew nuts business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more cashew nuts to sell.

Merlyn has been in this business for one year now.

In the future Merlyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more cashew nuts to sell.

loans.name: Simeon

texts.en: Simeon is a married man. He has 4 children. He describes himself to be visionary. He operates a retail business where he sells basins and other plastic containers. He has been involved in this business for 8 years. His business is located in a marketable area and his primary customers are the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds. He will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of basins and other items. His business goal is to have a bigger shop within 5 years. He hopes that in the future he will have a strong family. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of basins and other items

loans.name: Nellybeth

texts.en:
Nellybeth is 39 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell.

Nellybeth has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and also earns an income from buying and selling nipa.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Perla

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Perla works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Perla is borrowing PHP 7,000 through NWTF to buy additional fish nets and other fishing materials for her fishing business.

Perla has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fish nets and other fishing materials.

loans.name: Rolanda

texts.en:
Rolanda is 47 years old and married with five children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a retail charcoal business in the Philippines and requested 7,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Rolanda has successfully repaid 1 loan from NWTF. She has operated the charcoal business for 1 year and earns additional income from food vending.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: I Ketut

texts.en:
I Ketut manages 2 businesses which are raising pigs and growing cacao to earn more profit. 

He is able to make  early payments on his loans because he sold all of his pigs and a large amount of cacao. Currently, he can sell the pigs and cacao at a high price and I Ketut took advantage of this opportunity.

He needs another loan to purchase rice from a farmer and then sell it to a big buyer. The pig and cacao business operate successfully and he hopes he can manages a third business as well. I Ketut will save all the profit and use the capital. 

He promises to support his children's education through the high school level.

loans.use: to purchase rice.

loans.name: Shabana

texts.en:
Shabana is a 25-year-old young lady  living in Lahore. She has two children. She is a dedicated housewife and very interested in helping her family. 

One of the skills she learned form her mother is sewing.  She wants to contribute to her family's income and buy a sewing machine and necessary sewing items to start a sewing business. 

She is anxious to get started but due to a shortage of money, she is unable to buy a sewing machine because their family's income is low. She thanks Brac Pakistan, a Kiva partner, for the loan opportunity. This loan will help her to fulfill her dream of becoming self employed and an inspiration for her children.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and material.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is 44 years old, married and has four children. 

Anita is in the agricultural business and has raised pigs for 6 years. She has previously borrowed seven times from NWTF to sustain her business.  Anita requested 15,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

In the future, Anita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Airen

texts.en:
Airen is 34 years old and married with two children who attend school.

Airen works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested 16,000 PHP through NWTF  to purchase  sugar, sardines, snack foods, soap and other groceries.

Airen has previously repaid four loans from NWTF. She has operated the general store for eight years and earns additional income selling rice.

Airen aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, sardines, snack foods, soap and other groceries.

loans.name: Jerley Celestina

texts.es:
Jerley es una mujer de 30 años de edad que por mucho tiempo anduvo en la busca de un empleo para mantener su hogar y colaborar a su padre y madre que depende mucho de ella tanto para los cuidados como para la alimentación. 

Gracias a la llegada de una entidad que presta servicios micro-financieros puede soñar con un negocio y ser independiente por eso quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de mercancía como perfumes, lociones, fragancias, barnice, crema de manos, productos capilares etc.

Su sueño pues ya lo está logrando y es volverse independiente para tener entrada de dinero y poder auxiliar a sus padres cada que lo requieran por lo que está muy feliz y agradecida con la oportunidad que le brindan
texts.en:
Jerley is a 30-year-old woman who has been looking for work for a long time so she can support her household and help her parents who depend on her a great deal for their care and for sustenance. 

Thanks to the arrival of an organization that provides micro-financing services, she can dream of having a business and being independent. She wants to request a loan to buy merchandise such as perfumes, lotions, fragrances, nail polish, hand cream, hair products, etc. Her dream is coming true, which is to become independent, have a source of income and help her parents whenever they need it. She is very happy because of this and is most grateful for the opportunity she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy products such as perfumes, lotions, fragrances, nail polish, hand cream, and hair products.

loans.name: Leidy Johana

texts.es:
Un saludo desde Colombia! 

Leidy es una microempresaria dedicada y trabajadora, su campo de acción es la confección de bolsos, prestando el servicio a terceros.

Todo comenzó hace más de 5 años cuando trabajaba como empleada en un taller de confección y por medio de la practica aprendió el oficio; hoy en día, a sus 26 años de edad, ya tiene su propio taller en el que genera 2 empleos directos; trabaja todos los días y su fortaleza es la fabricación de bolsos deportivos; de esta forma intenta generar los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.

El crédito que solicita será invertido en la compra de una máquina plana y una cortadora, ya que actualmente corta la tela con tijeras y esto hace más tediosos y lento su trabajo.

De esta manera podrá cumplir con los requerimientos de sus clientes y entregar los pedidos de manera oportuna, con el fin aumentar la producción y adquirir nuevos contratos, que permitan darle continuidad a su microempresa.

Leidy sueña con seguir fortaleciendo su taller y tener cada día mayor nivel de producción para generar nuevas oportunidades de empleo y mejorar la calidad de vida tanto de su familia como la de las personas que influyen diariamente en su labor.

Apoye a esta emprendedora colombiana con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Greetings from Colombia!

Leidy is a dedicated, hard-working, small business owner who makes athletic bags for third-party vendors. Everything began five years ago when she worked as an employee at a sewing shop where she learned the trade. Today, at 26 years old, she has her own shop which has two direct employees. She works every day and her strength is manufacturing sports bags. In this way she tries to generate enough income to help her husband with the financial responsibilities for their household. 

The loan she is seeking will be used to invest in the purchase of an industrial sewing machine and a fabric cutter. Currently, she has to cut the fabric with scissors which is very tedious and slows down her work. This will allow her to meet her clients' requirements and deliver their orders in a timely fashion,  leading to increased production, new contracts and the continuity of her small business. 

Leidy dreams of continuing to build up her business and increasing her production every day leading to more employment opportunities and improving the quality of life of her family and of the people who work with her each day. 

Support this Colombian entrepreneur with a loan!

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine and a fabric cutter.

loans.name: Orlanda Edith

texts.es:
Orlanda una trabajadora e incansable mujer del campo madre de 5 hijos y todos ellos los pudo criar gracias a un negocio que empezó hace 15 años criando cerdos y pollos.

Debido a un problema de salud pero de sus animales muchos de sus pollos murieron generándole un gran déficit económico del cual era muy difícil recuperar.

Con el ánimo de levantar su empresa y seguir adelante sin importar las adversidades quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de 300 pollos de levante (son los recién nacidos, cuido para alimentarlos y comprar cerdos)

Con el crédito podrá recuperarse de la crisis que sufrió al perder sus animales y seguir con su profesión y solo mirar hacia al frente buscando el progreso de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Orlanda is a tireless worker from the countryside.  She is the mother of five children all of whom she was able to care for thanks to a business she started 15 years ago raising pigs and chickens. 

Due to a health problem with her animals, many of the chickens died causing a large financial loss from which it was very difficult to recover. In an effort to get her business back up and running and move forward without dwelling on adversity, she is asking for a loan to buy 300 hatchling chicks (newly born), feed for them, and pigs. 

The loan will allow her to recover from the crisis she suffered with the loss of her animals, and to continue with her profession, only looking ahead, seeking progress for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy 300 hatchling chicks, feed, and pigs.

loans.name: Neheru Group

texts.en:
Rashmita, aged about 26 years, is the group leader of the four-member Neheru Group of J.K.Pur, Rayagada, Odisha, India. Her family comprises three members: herself, her husband, and one son aged 3. The member standing first from left with raised hand is Rashmita. 

At present, she has been sewing dresses for ladies for the last two years and became a ladies' master tailor in her locality. She is a very active lady who wants some extra income out of her own efforts. Rashmita’s husband is assisting her to run the business smoothly by bringing thread, blouse pieces, buttons, etc., from the nearby town. 

At present, her family income is INR.4,000 per month, which is not sufficient to maintain the family. To improve her living conditions and to earn some extra income, she wants to avail a loan from Mahashakti.  From the loan amount she will purchase a sewing machine and stitching materials in bulk quantities. She has a dream to increase her business, stitch ready-made dresses, supply them to the market, and educate her children in a better school.

The other three members of her group are doing business individually.

loans.use: purchase stitching items

loans.name: Adelita

texts.en:
Adelita is 55 years old and a married mother of seven children, one of whom is in school. She works hard to provide for her family, having run a general store in the Philippines for 20 years. She also has a pig-fattening enterprise.

Adelita, who has borrowed and repaid four previous loans from NWTF, has requested a new one for PHP 12000 to buy more items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc. She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Jamuna Group

texts.en:
Sunita is the leader of a group and lives in Muniguda in the district of Rayagada, Odisha, India. She is a married woman of 21 years. She has a small family comprising three members: herself, her husband, and a one-year-old daughter . The member standing second from right with raised hand is Sunita. 

Like most families in the locality, she and her husband are running a grocery shop in the main market of Muniguda town. She sells rice, dal, tea, sugar, chocolate, etc., in her shop.  She is a very active lady who wants some extra income out of her own efforts.

Sunita’s husband is assisting her to run the business smoothly by purchasing grocery items from the nearby town. At present her family income is INR 5,000 per month from the grocery shop, which is not sufficient to maintain her family. 

To improve her living conditions and to earn some extra income, she wants to avail a loan from Mahashakti.  From the loan amount, she will purchase grocery items in bulk quantity to avail a cash discount and also save transportation costs, which she incurs frequently. She has a dream to have a wholesale shop in the town and educate her children in a better school.

The other eight members of her group are doing individual business.

loans.use: procure grocery items

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is a 24-year-old married woman and the mother of a five-year-old son. She is from Leyte, Philippines. Margie has been engaged in a hog-raising business for more than two years now. This is the source of her income. 

Several months ago, a typhoon hit the country, affecting thousands of households and businesses, including Margie's. 

As of now, she is requesting a loan to buy animal feed and additional piglets to raise. With this loan, Margie will be able to continue her hog-raising business, thus augmenting her income. 

In the future, Margie hopes to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and additional piglets to raise.

loans.name: Teodoro Alexander

texts.es:
Teodoro de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta 9º grado, está soltero y no tiene hijos. 

Teodoro trabaja en las oficinas del agua del cantón desde hace 11 años. El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar bloque, ladrillo, cemento, etc para construir el servicio lavable y arreglar una habitación, etc. Él planea en un futuro tener una casa propia para tener una familia y poder darle los estudios necesarios y adecuados a su futuros hijos.
texts.en:
Teodoro is 35 years old, studied until 9th grade, is single and has no children.

Teodoro has worked in the community water offices for 11 years. The loan that he is requesting is to buy cement blocks, bricks, cement, etc. to build a washable bathroom and to fix a room, etc. In the future he plans to have his own home, to have a family and to be able to give an adequate and necessary education to his future children.

loans.use: to buy cement blocks, bricks, cement, etc. to build a washable bathroom and to fix up a room.

loans.name: Duckens

texts.fr: Duckens vit a Port-au-Prince dans le département de l'ouest d'Haiti,il est étudiant,célibataire. Duckens se sent très heureux en utilisant son prêt Kiva pour la première fois pour  acheter des produits d’énergie renouvelable Earthspark/Enèji Pwòp. Il est propriétaire d'un magasin d'appareil technologie. Duckens veut intégrer ces produits dans son magasin dans le but d'augmenter son stock.
texts.en: Duckens lives in Port-au-Prince, Haiti, in the western district. He is a student and unmarried. Duckens feels very happy using his Kiva loan for the first time to purchase Earthspark/Enèji Pwòp renewable energy products. He is the owner of a store for tech supplies. He wants to integrate these products into his store with the goal of increasing his inventory.

loans.use: to increase his stock of renewable energy products

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 28 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,500 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like can goods, egg, milk, noodles, etc.

Delia has borrowed and paid nine loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
Natalia es una mujer dedicada a su familia y a su labor. 

Su tenacidad y perseverancia le han permitido salir adelante, sobrepasando diversos obstáculos que se le presentan. 

Desde hace 2 años inició su propio negocio prestando el servicio de arreglo de uñas y cepillado de cabello, presta el servicio a domicilio según el requerimiento de sus clientes. 

Esto le ha permitido generar los recursos para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar y a solventar las necesidades de su único hijo. 

El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de un secador para el cabello y un lavacabezas, esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y prestar un servicio más completo a sus clientes, de una manera más ágil y eficiente; lo que beneficiará el margen de utilidades que percibe por su labor. 

Natalia manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder continuar con su labor, acreditar y fortalecer bien su negocio para lograr ser más competitiva en el mercado y así tener la capacidad para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia abriendo un local donde preste todos sus servicios.

Apoya a esta mujer con un préstamo para que sus sueños se puedan hacer realidad!
texts.en:
Natalia is a woman who is devoted to her family and her job. Her tenacity and perseverance have enabled her to get ahead, overcoming various obstacles as they arose. Two years ago, she started her own business providing manicures and hair styling. She also goes to clients' homes on request. This has allowed her to generate income to support her husband with the household finances and to meet the needs of her only child.

The loan that Natalia is requesting will be used to purchase a hair dryer and a shampoo chair. This will allow her to continue with her work and provide a more complete service to her clients in a more streamlined and efficient way, which will raise the profit margin she receives for her work. Natalia says that her greatest desires are to keep working, to establish and strengthen her business in order to become more competitive in the market and thus have the ability to give her family a better quality of life, and to open a locale to provide all her services. Please support her with a loan so she can make her dreams come true!

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer and a shampoo chair.

loans.name: Bibiana

texts.en:
Bibiana is 60 years old and married with five children.

She is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12.000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Bibiana has been raising livestock for five years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF and more recently, from Kiva, to sustain it.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her livestock.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda works hard to support her family. Erlinda is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Erlinda requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients like sugar, bananas, cooking oil for her food vending business.

Erlinda has been in this business for 10 years now.

Erlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like sugar, bananas, cooking oil for her food vending business

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is a widowed woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Flora is 52 years old with child who is still in school.

Flora has a general store in the Philippines. Flora requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further grow her general store.

Flora has been in this business for 17 years. Flora would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Sughran

texts.en:
Sughran is 52 years old and is married with four children. She lives in Lahore with her family. She makes sure that all her family's needs are met and is always trying to support them. 

One of her children is an electrician by profession. He has six years of experience in this business. He wants to purchase some electrical goods in order to provide better services and avoid any stock-outs. 

He is short of the funds needed to buy these goods; therefore, his mother has decided to help her son and provide funds for him by requesting a loan. 

She is thankful to BRAC Pakistan and Kiva and happy to help her son in his business. She is a role model for her son.

loans.use: To buy electrical goods for her son's shop.

loans.name: Kadjatou

texts.fr:
Mme KADJATOU est veuve et mère de 04enfants. Sur la photo, elle présente dans un plat les grains qui servent à préparer le jus de ossata. Le plus âgé a 20ans et le moins âgé a 16ans. 04 vont à l’école et elle a 06personnes en charge.
Mme vend du jus (ossata, zoom-kom, etc.) depuis 10ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages.
Elle veut s’acheter 01sac de sucre et 01 sac de petit mil pour la préparation du jus.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut réinvestir dans son activité. Elle ambitionne s’acheter une parcelle.
texts.en:
Ms. KADJATOU is a widow and the mother of four children. The oldest is 20 years old, and the youngest is 16. Four go to school. She has six persons to support. In the photo, she is presenting a dish of grains used for making the beverage called “oassata”. 

Ms. KADJATOU has been selling beverages (ossata, zoom-kom, etc.) for ten years. She gets her supplies from the villages. She wants to purchase a bag of sugar and a sack of millet for making beverages. With the profits, she wants to reinvest in her business. Her ambtion is to purchase a parcel of land.

loans.use: to purchase a bag of sugar and a sack of millet for making beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy baby clothes and toys.

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr:
Mme AWA est mariée et mère de 02enfants. Le plus âgé a 11ans et le moins âgé a 07ans. 02 vont à l’école et elle a 03personnes en charge.
Mme vend de l’eau minérale, des pagnes, boucle et fait la coiffure depuis 12ans. Elle s’approvisionne au Mali et à Cotonou.
Elle veut s’acheter 02rouleaux de pagnes Bazin, 01douzaine de boucle d’oreilles et 01douzaine de mèche Brésilienne.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut réinvestir dans son activité. Elle ambitionne s’acheter une parcelle.
texts.en:
Ms. AWA is a married mother of two children. The oldest is 11 years old, and the youngest is 7. Both go to school. She has three persons to support.

Ms. AWA has been selling mineral water, ’pagnes’ (the colorful cloth of western Africa), and earrings for twelve years, as well as styling hair. She gets her supplies from Mali and in Cotonou. She wants to purchase 2 rolls of damask ‘pagne’ cloth, a dozen earrings, and a dozen Brazilian hair extensions. With her profits, she wants to reinvest in her business. Her ambition is to purchase a parcel of land.

loans.use: to purchase 2 rolls of damask ‘pagne’ cloth, a dozen earrings, and a dozen Brazilian hair extensions

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Florencia works hard to support her family.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She also earns additional income from rice retailing. Florencia is borrowing 9,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Florencia has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 44 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school.

Jocelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more items like snack foods, canned goods and other groceries.

Jocelyn has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years and also earns an income from farming rice and restaurant businesses.

Jocelyn aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items like snack foods, canned goods and other groceries for her general store

loans.name: Anita

texts.en: Anita is one of the store owners in their barangay. She is 43 years old and blessed with three children. She and her husband are aiming for a happy and successful life to give their children a bright future. To achieve their goals, they work hand-in-hand to generate income. She wants to increase her product offerings and satisfy her customers' demand, but she has limited capital. For this reason, she would like to access financial assistance from Kiva lenders in the amount of 48,000 PHP. She will use the loan to purchase more inventory of grocery items, rice, meat, frozen foods, Avon, and Natasha products to resell. Having this financial assistance, Anita believes that, someday, she will further improve her business.

loans.use: to  purchase grocery items, rice, meat, frozen foods, Avon, and Natasha products to resell

loans.name: Melva

texts.en:
Melva is 39 years old and married with five children.

Melva works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF in order to buy more groceries to sell.

Melva has been in this business for 14 years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Melva aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy stock of items such as soap, candies, sugar, and milk to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Luz

texts.en:
Ma. Luz is 44 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Ma. Luz is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Ma. Luz has been farming rice for 14 years and also earns additional income from pig fattening.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, which is to save enough money to buy more farm land.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more eggplant, sweet potatoes, bitter melon, string beans, cabbages and tomatoes to resell

loans.name: Angelito

texts.en:
Angelito, a 32-year-old, has been a rice producer and farmer for the last 10 years. He is the father of two children, whom he raises with his wife, and to whom he passes on his devotion and dedication to rice growing. However, he also impresses upon them the importance of studying to earn an education that will help them develop in the workplace.

Angelito's goal is to continue the improvements, so for this cycle he is requesting a loan to purchase the necessary inputs to improve the nutrition of his crops, and advance towards the goal he has set.

Angelito's dream is to have a modern first-world rice farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide and seed for his farm business

loans.name: Hermogena

texts.en:
Aldrie is 20 years old and is studying for his Bachelor of Science degree in Marine Transportation. He is currently in his first year of this three year course.

Hermogena, who is the  mother of Aldrie, has requested a loan of 21,000 PHP to pay tuition fees of the first semester of the school year 2014-15.

Aldrie plans to graduate and be gainfully employed.

loans.use: to pay her son's tuition fees

loans.name: Blanca Nubia

texts.es:
La señora Blanca una mujer de admirar a sus 59 años de edad consciente de la situación que atraviesan en su hogar tiene el deseo de ayudar y cooperar para superar juntos la crisis por eso quiere pedir un crédito para la compra de frutas que ofertara puerta a puerta con la ilusión de llevar todas las noches un capital que sirva para pagar alguna deuda o comprar un plato de comida. 

Sueña con poder tener un punto fijo de distribución y salir adelante y sin importar la edad colaborarle a los suyos con lo que mas pueda.

Pedimos la colaboración para la señora Blanca que solo tiene el espíritu de ayudar de cooperar de no quejarse por la situación si no buscarle una solución.
texts.en:
Blanca is an admirable woman 59-years old, well aware of the situation she faces at home.

She has a desire to help, contribute and overcome the crisis together, and that's why she wants to borrow money: to purchase of fruits that she will sell door to door with the hope of taking home every night enough funds to pay a debt or buy a bite to eat. 

She dreams of having a fixed location and moving forward. Regardless of her age, she wants to help her family as much as she can. 

We ask your assistance with Blanca, who only has the spirit of not complaining about her situation but rather seeking a solution to it.

loans.use: buy fruits to sell door to door looking to improve the conditions in her home.

loans.name: Kuilga

texts.fr:
Mme KUILGA est mariée et mère de 02enfants. Le plus âgé a 15ans et le moins âgé a 07ans. 02 vont à l’école.
Mme gère un restaurant depuis 02ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les caves.
Elle veut s’acheter 10caisses de bière, 10caisses de sucrerie.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut réinvestir dans son activité. Elle ambitionne s’acheter une parcelle.
texts.en: Mrs. Kuilga is married and the mother of two children. The elder child is 15 year old, and the younger is seven years old. Both go to school. Mrs. Kuliga has been managing a restaurant for two years. She stocks up at beverage stores. She would like to buy 10 cases of beer and 10 cases of soft drinks. She would like to use her revenues to reinvest in her business. Her goal is to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy 10 cases of beer and 10 cases of soft drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar energy system.

loans.name: Raul Panfilo

texts.es:
Raul es un hombre muy trabajador, tiene 56 años de edad, y vive en Parcona junto a su familia. Tiene 3 hijos que son su mayor orgullo en la vida y una esposa que lo apoya de manera incondicional. Desde hace más de 20 años se dedica al negocio de venta de animales y le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, amable y siempre da lo mejor de si mismo para obtener buenos resultados.
